member.name: T:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw
member.summary: The draw interface is used to add custom drawing to the DotSpatial view.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw.ClearDrawing(System.Int32)
member.summary: Clears all custom drawing on the specified drawing layer.
member.param: Handle of the drawing layer to clear.
member.remarks: Clearing a single drawing (using the drawing handle) is faster than clearing all drawings.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw.ClearDrawings
member.summary: Clears all custom drawings on all drawing layers.
member.remarks: Clearing a single drawing (using the drawing handle) is faster than clearing all drawings.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw.DrawCircle(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Drawing.Color,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a circle on the current drawing layer.
member.param: X coordinate of the center of the circle.
Y coordinate of the center of the circle.
Radius of the circle in pixels.
Color to use when drawing the circle.
Specifies whether or not the circle is drawn filled.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw.DrawLine(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Draws a line on the current drawing layer.
member.param: First x coordinate.
First y coordinate.
Second x coordinate.
Second y coordinate.
Width of the line in pixels
Color to draw the line with.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw.DrawPoint(System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Draws a point on the current drawing layer.
member.param: X coordinate.
Y coordinate.
Size of the point in pixels.
Color to draw the point with.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw.DrawPolygon(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Drawing.Color,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a polygon on the current drawing layer.
member.param: Array of x points for the polygon.
Array of y points for the polygon.
Color to draw the polygon with.
Specifies whether or not to fill the polygon.
member.remarks: The points in a polygon should be defined in a clockwise order and have no crossing lines if they are to be filled. The first and last point should be the same.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw.NewDrawing(DotSpatial.Compatibility.ReferenceType)
member.summary: Creates a new drawing layer.
member.param: Specifies whether to use screen coordinates or projected map coordinates.
member.returns: Returns a drawing handle. You should save this handle if you wish to clear this drawing later.
member.remarks: The concept of drawing layers is only partially implemented in this version of the MapWinGIS, which is used by the DotSpatial. There is only one active drawing layer, which is the most recently created one. There is no way to access any other drawing layers other than the current one.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IDraw.DoubleBuffer
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to use double buffering. Double buffering makes the drawing of the custom drawings smoother (not flickering). It is recommended that you use double buffering.

member.summary: Returns the number of layers that had information from the Identify function call.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IIdentifiedLayers.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an IdentifiedShapes object containing inforamtion about shapes that were identified during the Identify function call.

member.summary: Adds a label to this layer.
member.param: The text of the label.
The color of the label text.
X position in projected map units.
Y position in projected map units.
Text justification. Can be hjCenter, hjLeft or hjRight.

members.member:
The following function was added for plug-in 3.1 version compatibility
Adds an extended label to this layer.
The text of the label. The color of the label text. X position in projected map units. Y position in projected map units. Text justification. Can be hjCenter, hjLeft or hjRight. The rotation angle for the label.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.ClearLabels
member.summary: Clears all labels for this layer.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.ClearUDPointImageList
member.summary: Clears out the list of images to be used by the tkImageList point type. See also UserPointImageListAdd, UserPointImageListItem, UserPointImageListCount, and (on the shape interface) ShapePointImageListID.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Font(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the font to use for all labels on this layer.
member.param: Name of the font or font family. Example: "Arial"
Size of the font.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.GetObject
member.summary: Gets the underlying MapWinGIS object for this layer. The object can be either a MapWinGIS.Shapefile or a MapWinGIS.Image. If the layer is a grid layer the MapWinGIS.Grid object can be retrieved using the GetGridObject method.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.GetUserFillStipple(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a single row in the user defined line stipple. There are 32 rows in a fill stipple (0-31). Each row is defined the same way as a UserLineStipple.
member.param: The index of the row to get. Must be between 0 and 31 inclusive.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.HideVertices
member.summary: Hides all vertices in the shapefile. Only applies to line and polygon shapefiles.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.LoadShapeLayerProps
member.summary: Loads the shapefile rendering properties from a .mwsr file whose base fileName matches the shapefile. If the file isn't found, false is returned. Function call is ignored and returns false if the layer is a grid.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.LoadShapeLayerProps(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the shapefile rendering properties from the specified fileName. Function call is ignored and returns false if the layer is a grid.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves this layer to a new position in the layer list. The highest position is the topmost layer in the display.
member.param: The new position.
The group to put this layer in.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.SaveShapeLayerProps
member.summary: Saves the shapefile rendering properties to a .mwsr file whose base fileName matches the shapefile. Function call is ignored and returns false if the layer is a grid.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.SaveShapeLayerProps(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the shapefile rendering properties to the specified fileName. Function call is ignored if the layer is a grid.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.SetUserFillStipple(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a single row in the user defined line stipple. There are 32 rows in a fill stipple (0-31). Each row is defined the same way as a UserLineStipple.
member.param: The index of the row to set. Must be between 0 and 31 inclusive.
The row value to set in the fill stipple.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UpdateLabelInfo
member.summary: Updates the label information file stored for this layer.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UserPointImageListAdd(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Adds an image to the list of point images used by the tkImageList point type. See also UserPointImageListItem, UserPointImageListCount, ClearUDPointImageList, and (on the shape interface) ShapePointImageListID.
member.param: The new image to add.
member.returns: The index for this image, to be passed to ShapePointImageListID or other functions.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UserPointImageListCount
member.summary: Gets the count of images from the list of images to be used by the tkImageList point type. See also UserPointImageListAdd, UserPointImageListItem, ClearUDPointImageList, and (on the shape interface) ShapePointImageListID.
member.returns: The count of items in the image list.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UserPointImageListItem(System.Int64)
member.summary: Gets an image from the list of images to be used by the tkImageList point type. See also UserPointImageListAdd, UserPointImageListCount, ClearUDPointImageList, and (on the shape interface) ShapePointImageListID.
member.param: The image index to retrieve.
member.returns: The index associated with this index; or null/nothing if nonexistant.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.ZoomTo
member.summary: Zooms the display to this layer, taking into acount the View.ExtentPad.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.ShowVertices(System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows all vertices for the entire shapefile. Applies only to line and polygon shapefiles.
member.param: The color to draw vertices with.
The size of each vertex.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.ToString
member.summary: Returns information about the given layer in a human-readible string.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.GetGridObject
member.summary: Returns the MapWinGIS.Grid object associated with the layer. If the layer is not a grid layer, "Nothing" will be returned.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.SkipOverDuringSave
member.summary: Indicates whether to skip over the layer when saving a project.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of this shapefile. Applies only to shapefiles. Setting the color of the shapefile will clear any selected shapes and will also reset each individual shape to the same color. The coloring scheme will also be overriden.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.ColoringScheme
member.summary: Gets or sets the coloring scheme. The Shapefile and Grid objects each have their own coloring scheme object. It is important to cast the ColoringScheme to the proper type.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.DrawFill
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not to draw the fill for a polygon shapefile.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.DynamicVisibilityExtents
member.summary:
Gets or sets the extents where the layer changes from visible to not visible or vice versa.
If the map is zoomed beyond these extents, the layer is invisible until the map is zoomed to be within these extents.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Expanded
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the layer's coloring scheme is expanded in the legend.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Extents
member.summary: Returns the extents of this layer.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.FileName
member.summary: Returns the fileName of this layer. If the layer is memory-based only it may not have a valid fileName.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.FillStipple
member.summary:
Gets or sets the stipple pattern to use for the entire shapefile.
The valid values for this property are:
Custom
DashDotDash
Dashed
Dotted
None

member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the layer without respect to any group.

member.summary: Gets or sets the handle of the group that this layer belongs to.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Handle

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Icon

member.summary: Determines whether labels are scaled for this layer.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.LabelsShadow
member.summary: Determines whether labels are shadowed for this layer.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.LabelsShadowColor
member.summary: Determines the color of the labels shadows.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.LabelsVisible
member.summary: Turns labels on or off for this layer.

member.summary:
Returns the type of this layer. Valid values are:
Grid
Image
Invalid
LineShapefile
PointShapefile
PolygonShapefile

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.LineOrPointSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the line or point size. If the PointType is ptUserDefined then the size of the user defined point will be multiplied by the LineOrPointSize. For all other points and for lines, the LineOrPointSize is represented in pixels.

members.member:
The following was added for plug-in 3.1 version compatibility
Sets the width between lines for multiple-line drawing styles (e.g, doublesolid).

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.LineStipple
member.summary:
Gets or sets the stipple pattern to use for the entire shapefile.
The valid values for this property are:
Custom
DashDotDash
Dashed
Dotted
None

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Projection
member.summary: Returns or sets the projection of this layer. Projections must be / will be in PROJ4 format. If no projection is present, "" will be returned. If an invalid projection is provided, it's not guaranteed to be saved!

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the layer name.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.OutlineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the outline color for this layer. Only applies to polygon shapefile layers.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.PointImageScheme
member.summary: Gets or sets the Point Image Scheme object for a given point layer. To be used from DotSpatial only

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.PointType
member.summary:
Gets or sets the point type for this shapefile.
The valid values for this property are:
ptCircle
ptDiamond
ptSquare
ptTriangleDown
ptTriangleLeft
ptTriangleRight
ptTriangleUp
ptUserDefined

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Shapes
member.summary: This property gives access to all shapes in the layer. Only applies to shapefile layers.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the tag for this layer. The tag is simply a string that can be used by the programmer to store any information desired.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UseDynamicVisibility
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to use DynamicVisibility.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UseLabelCollision
member.summary: Determines whether MapWinGIS ocx will hide labels which collide with already drawn labels or not.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UserLineStipple
member.summary: Gets or sets the user defined line stipple. A line stipple is simply a 32-bit integer whose bits define a pattern that can be displayed on the screen. For example, the value 0011 0011 in binary would represent a dashed line ( -- --).

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UserPointType
member.summary: Gets or sets the user defined point image for this layer. To display the user defined point the layer's PointType must be set to ptUserDefined.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.UseTransparentColor
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to use transparency on an Image layer.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.VerticesVisible
member.summary: (Doesn't apply to line shapefiles) Indicates whether the vertices of a line or polygon are visible.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.ILayerOld.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the layer is visible.

member.summary: Queries all of the active shapefile layers for any within the specified tolerance of the given point.

The y coordinate, in projected map units, of the point to query.
Tolerance is the distance, in projected map units, around the point to include in the query.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.LockLegend
member.summary: Prevents the legend from showing any changes made to it until the UnlockLegend function is called. The legend maintains a count of the number of locks it has, only redrawing if there are no locks.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.UnlockLegend
member.summary: Unlocking the Legend allows it to redraw and update the view to reflect any changes that were made. The legend maintains a count of the number of locks it has, only redrawing if there are no locks. There can never be a negative number of locks.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.LockMap
member.summary: Prevents the map from updating due to any changes made to the layers that are loaded until the UnlockMap function is called. The map maintains a count of the number of locks it has, only redrawing if there are no locks.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.UnlockMap
member.summary: Allows the map to redraw entirely when changes are made. The map maintains a count of the number of locks it has, only redrawing if there are no locks. There can never be a negative number of locks.

Y coordinate of the original point in pixels.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.LabelsUseProjectLevel
member.summary: Determines whether labels are loaded from and saved to a project-specific label file or from a shapefile-specific label file. Using a project-level label file will create a new subdirectory with the project's name.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.SelectionPersistence
member.summary: Gets or sets whether selection should be persistent. If selection is persistent, previously selected shapes are not cleared before selecting the new shapes. When selection is persistent you must select nothing to clear the selection. The default value for this property is false. When selection is not persistent, all selected shapes are cleared between selection routines unless the user is holding down a control or shift key.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.SelectionTolerance
member.summary: The tolerance, in projected map units, to use for selection.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.SelectMethod
member.summary:
Gets or sets the selection method to use.
Inclusion
Intersection
Inclusion means that the entire shape must be within the selection bounds in order to select the shape. Intersection means that only a portion of the shape must be within the selection bounds in order for the shape to be selected.

member.name: P:DotSpatial.Compatibility.IViewOld.SelectColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to indicate a selected shape.

member.name: T:DotSpatial.Compatibility.SelectMode
member.summary:
Gets or sets the selection method to use.
Inclusion
Intersection
Inclusion means that the entire shape must be within the selection bounds in order to select the shape. Intersection means that only a portion of the shape must be within the selection bounds in order for the shape to be selected.

member.name: F:DotSpatial.Compatibility.SelectMode.Inclusion
member.summary: The entire contents of the potentially selected item must fall withing the specified extents

member.name: F:DotSpatial.Compatibility.SelectMode.Intersection
member.summary: The item will be selected if any of the contents of the potentially selected item can be found in the specified extents.
